summary.para: Uniquely identifies a process by its PID and the time the process began. An array of RM_UNIQUE_PROCESS structures can be passed to the function.

remarks.para: The RM_UNIQUE_PROCESS structure can be used to uniquely identify an application in an structure or registered with the Restart Manager session by the function.

summary.para: The creation time of the process. The time is provided as a FILETIME structure that is returned by the lpCreationTime parameter of the function.
